release_note: Bugfixes and improvements
Bugfixes and improvements
Stability and performance improvements
Support changing font size of markdown preview Fix tag list layout is corrupt
Floating keyboard support on iPad!
The screen layout gets broken when closing modal screens
Fixed the editor randomly crashes while in background Fixed the app crashes on cancelling the image picker dialog
Significant data sync performance improvement especially on images! Use system color scheme for syntax theme by default Fixed TOC anchors not working

Hey we ve got significant bug fixes here! Editor toolbar is not showing correctly on iPhone 12 Pro Max Thanks Hirofumi and Justin Status bar turns white while keyboard is displayed Thanks Hirofumi Attaching images is not working Thanks Usamao Crashes when deleting a notebook And some improvements Bigger toolbar buttons to fit your fingers better Thanks Jan
Happy new year! This update fixes a bug where inter note linking is not working.

g day. Autumn is coming! Improvements Faster launch speed Set status and tag based on current query context Thanks Shogo san When you are selecting a tag or status new note will have the tag status automatically. Markdown renderer updates mermaid now supports User journey diagram and Entity relationship diagrams Bugfix Pinned notes not listed at the top in tag and status groups Thanks Shimizu san
Fix a bug where background note syncing not working

Hi inkdroppers Thanks for using Inkdrop! I m Takuya the solo developer of Inkdrop. I m so excited to release the new version. It comes with a lot of big improvements!!!! Pin notes to top Workspaces Collapse expand notebook on sidebar Include child notes Remember sort order of note list per view all notebook tag status pins Toggle task list item by tapping or x Zoom preview Refurbished icons Hope you like it :D
New syntax theme: material dark mod Thanks Otawara san Support inkdrop: URI scheme to just open the app Detect correct image MIME type
Fixed a bug where checkbox can t be toggled
Support global search Advanced markdown renderer options math breaks toc flowchart sequence diagrams etc. Fix tablet layout issue
Bugfix: Notebook submenu does not update properly

We ve got a big update today! New features Notebook submenu Tap button on the right of a notebook item on the sidebar. The submenu lists statuses and tags that are associated with notes in the selected notebook. Revision history You can restore an old note revision stored in your device locally. Math support Yes! Built in Math support! Auto backup for editing note You can restore the last edit when the app crashed. Improvements Show editor when creating new note Show error message when failed to load notes
bugfix: Cannot insert images
bugfix: Cannot toggle checkbox in note preview Thanks Shota san

New feature: Selecting multiple notes New feature: Highlighting tables and codeblocks in the editor New feature: Long press the note list item to show the note information screen New feature: Duplicating notes Improvement: Better UI performance Bugfix: Some memory leaks in data sync Bugfix: Flashy modal screens Bugfix: Settings screen not working properly Thanks Otawara san Bugfix: Editor not updating when the note is updated via sync Bugfix: Revert changes regarding checkpointers of data sync which might have been causing that some notes won t be synced in some cases
Bugfix: Sync not working in some cases Bugfix: Sort order is not properly preserved when loading more items on note list bar Bugfix: Trigger indexing FTS when sync finished
New app icon Sync notes in background Great performance improvement on full text search End to end encryption support Fixed: Emptying trash not working Cleaner search bar
Fix internal compatibility check Update domain
Bugfix: The app is stuck on white screen after logging in in some case.
Bugfix: Table align doesn t work Bugfix: Trashed notes with status are shown in the note list of status columns Thanks Ikeda san Bugfix: Sync status view is distractive on tablets

New feature: Inline HTML support Bugfix: Cursor jumps to invalid position when got focus at the bottom of the note Bugfix: The editor is unloaded when the app resumed from background Thanks Takeuchi san
Bugfix: The editor unexpectedly scrolls up when auto save Thanks Yoshioka san and Otawara san Bugfix: Image widgets become invisible when editing note got synced

New Feature: Support changing editor font family Thanks Kurt Improvement: Auto save after 5 seconds Improvement: Fix CJK input problem Improvement: Scroll to cursor position on focus Thanks Otawara san
Support 6.5 Display Fix a bug where note conflicts often occur on iPad

Bugfix: Resolve sync issue that edited note sometimes unexpectedly got lost Improvement: Make a copy of a note when detected an update conflict Improvement: Update note list immediately after saving editing note Thanks Sceptic
New feature: Task progress view New feature: Show invisible characters Thanks Sceptic Bugfix: Fixed a problem syncing currently editing note
Fix CJK input problem
Built completely from scratch! A bunch of new features are finally here: Great performance improvements Full tablet support Dark theme Note sharing Image attachments Custom database and many more!
Save editing note immediately when the app became inactive Thanks Issei

Thank you for your bug reports and feedback. This update includes the following resolutions: New feature: Add task list toolbar button Thanks Geoff! Improvement: Continuous list for task list which adds automatically on pressing return key Thanks Geoff! Bugfix: Avoid hunging on indexing too long note Thanks Ohshima san! Bugfix: Context menu won t show up on tapping near cursor in edit mode Thanks jhartST!
Support showing attached images Fix an issue with cursor position
